title: Warriors All-Stars + 27 DLCs
body:
Warriors All-Stars + 27 DLCs


Genres/Tags: Action, Slasher, Third-person, 3D
Companies: Omega Force / Koei Tecmo
Languages: RUS/ENG/MULTI6
Original Size: 17.4 GB
Repack Size: from 6.9 GB [Selective Download]

 
 

Download Mirrors

  • 1337x / KAT [magnet] [.torrent file only]
  • FreeTorrents
  • Tapochek.net [magnet]
  • Filehoster: MultiUpload (10+ hosters, interchangeable) [Use JDownloader2]
  • Filehoster: WorldSrc [Single Direct Link] (Upto 100MB/s, NOT compatible with other mirrors)

Discussion and (possible) future updates on CS.RIN.RU thread

Screenshots (Click to enlarge)


Repack Features

  • Based on WARRIORS.ALL.STARS-CODEX ISO release: codex-warriors.all.stars.iso (18,427,641,856 bytes)
  • WARRIORS.ALL.STARS.DLC.PACK-CODEX (267 MB) installed over
  • 27 DLCs included and activated
  • 100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation
  • NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
  • Selective Download feature: you may skip downloading and installing of HD (720p), Full HD (1920×1080) and Oriental (Korean & Japanese) videos to save you some traffic
  • Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from cumulative 17.4 to 6.9~12.2 GB, depending on selected components)
  • Installation takes 25-60 minutes (depending on your system)
  • After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
  • HDD space after installation: up to 22 GB
  • Repack uses pZlib library by Razor12911
  • At least 2 GB of free RAM (inc. virtual) required for installing this repack

Game Description

A battle of heroes where everyone is the lead! The very first all-star title of Koei Tecmo!

The rousing action essential to “Warriors” series is powered up with new elements, such as open scenarios and multiple endings! Impressive assembly of 30 characters backed up by the original voice actors, and action that combines both familiar traits of the original series and new exiting elements like “Musou Rush”.

Furthermore, each character and their progression are drawn vividly, through special strengths and effects, known as “Hero Skills,” and the ways story and interactions change based on the battles they fight.

Enjoy the epic story of collaboration of heroes that brakes the borders of diverse range of worlds!

You can skip downloading of videos you don’t need. Here is the list of selective/optional files.

  • fg-selective-videos-1080p.bin (Full HD videos in 1920×1080)
  • fg-selective-videos-720p.bin (HD videos in 1280×720)
  • fg-optional-oriental-videos.bin (Korean and Japanese videos)
